data.actual_result: The keyboard is not minimised and squishes the invite UI above the keyboard.
data.expected_result: The keyboard minimises and the invite menu is fully displayed.
data.short_description: Keyboard does not hide when using a Discord invite link in Safari and opening in the app if you were previously typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Start typing in a channel / have the keyboard up in a channel or DM. - Press the home button / go to the home screen. - Open up Safari. - Enter the URL to a discord server invite such as  - Press enter to load the Discord invite page. - When the pop-up asking to "Open in Discord" appears, tap "Open".
